apps.name: Hydroviewer RFS v2
apps.description: View past, current, and forecasted river conditions globally with maps and charts from the River Forecast System (RFS).

apps.name: GRACE Regional Groundwater Analyst
apps.description: Monitor regional groundwater storage changes based on GRACE and GRACE-FO gravity anomaly measurements.

apps.name: Aquifer Analyst
apps.description: Map and analyze your groundwater well locations and observations locally and privately on your browser.

apps.name: Groundwater Data Mapper (legacy)
apps.description: The original groundwater data mapping and well management application.
